medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient was found dead on the street in the early hours before dawn. History reported by relatives included cocaine abuse.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Relatives reported a history of cocaine abuse. No mention of other past medical conditions or family history of diseases.
medical_history.social_history: The patient had a history of working as a fisherman and was in a geographic location consistent with a drug dealing district.
